check.name: ParentMetadataReferencePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Parent Metadata Reference concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ParentMetadataReference is present."
if(ParentMetadataReference is not None and len(ParentMetadataReference) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ParentMetadataReference concept is not present"
return False
